column2: "Sɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom du asaase a hom rokɔ akɛfa no do
column3: na ɔpam amanaman pii wɔ hom enyim
column11: amanaman esuon a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen hom no;"

column2: "na sɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yi hɔn ma wɔ hom enyim
column3: na hom ku hɔn a; ɔno hom nsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa; mma hom nnye hɔn nndzi ahyɛmu
column4: na mma hom nnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr so:"

column2: "nkyii so mma hom nnye hɔn nndzi awarwar; mma mmfa hom mbabaa mma hom mbabanyin
column3: mma hom nngye hɔn mbabaa so awar mma hom mbabanyin."

column2: "Na wɔbɛdan hom mbabanyin enyi ma woeegyaa m'ekyir dzi
column3: na waakɔsom enyame fofor; ma EWURADZE ebufuw adzɛw hom do

column2: "Mbom mbrɛ hom nye hɔn ndzi no nye yi; hom ndwuruw hɔn afɔrmbukyia na wombubu hɔn edum mu esinesin
column3: na wontwitwa hɔn abosompɔw Aserim no ngu
column4: na wɔmfa gya nhyew hɔn ehonyi a wɔasen no."

column2: "Na hom yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hom dɛ bɛyɛ nankasa no soronko ɔman wɔ aman a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara mu."
"Nnyɛ dɛ hom dodow so sen ɔman biara ntsi na EWURADZE dze no dɔ sii hom do
column3: na eso ɔsaan mu yii hom: na hom suar dodow wɔ aman nyinara mu."

column2: "Mbom osiandɛ EWURADZE dɔ hom
column3: na ɔpɛ dɛ odzi ne ntam a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no do ntsi
column4: na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen eyi hom
column5: na ɔapon hom efi no mu

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhu dɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column3: ɔno nye Nyankopɔn; Nyame nokwafo a osie ahyɛmu nye mbɔbɔrhu ma hɔn a wɔdɔ no na wodzi ne mbransɛm do dze kodu ebusuasantsen apem do;"

column2: "na otua hɔn a wɔtan no kaw dze bɔ hɔn enyim
column3: dze sɛɛ hɔn: ɔrennyɛ nyaa mma nyia ɔtan no
column4: obotua no kaw dze abɔ enyim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi dzi mbrasɛm
column3: nye atsɛmbu a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: osiandɛ hom tsie atsɛmbu yi
column6: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn so bedzi ahyɛmu nye mbɔbɔrhu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no do ama hom:"

column2: "na ɔbɔdɔ hom
column3: na oehyira hom
column4: na ɔama hom adɔr: na so oehyira hom honam mu aba na hom asaase mu aba
column5: hom eburow nye hom nsa hom wo ngo
column6: hom anantwi mu ngu mu nye hom nguankuw mu mburwa
column7: wɔ asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hom no do."

column2: "Wobehyira hom asen aman nyinara: ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa anaa hom fiembowa biar rennyɛ ɔbɔnyin wɔ hom mu."
"Na EWURADZE beyi yarba nyinara efi hom do; na ɔremmfa Egypt yarba bɔn a hom nyim no bi nnto hom do
column3: na ɔdze bɔto hɔn a wɔtan hom nyinara do."

column2: "Na hom bɛhyew aman a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn beyi hɔn ama hom no nyinara; mma hom enyi nnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr: nkyii so mma hom nnsom hɔn enyame; na ɔno bɛyɛ efir ama hom."
"Sɛ hom se wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ
column3: Amanaman yi dɔɔ so sen hɛn; na yɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yeetum etu hɔn a
column5: "mma nnsuro hɔn: kaa dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze yɛɛ Farao

column2: "nsɔhwɛ akɛse no a hom enyiwa hunii
column3: nye nsɛnkyerɛdze
column6: nye abasa a wɔatserɛw mu a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze yii hom no: dɛmara na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ aman a hom suro hɔn no nyinara."

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɔsoma nkotokrodo wɔ hɔn mu
column3: ekodu dɛ hɔn a wɔaka

column2: "Mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn wɔ hom finimfin
column3: Nyame kɛse a no ho yɛ hu no a."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛpam amanaman no efi hom enyim nkakrankakra: mma hom nnhyew hɔn prɛko
column3: bɛyɛ na haban mu mbowa adɔɔ so hom wo do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn beyi hɔn ama wɔ hom enyim
column3: na ɔdze ɔkogu kɛse bɛka hɔn egu

column2: "Na obeyi hɔn ahemfo ahyɛ hom nsa
column3: na hom aama hɔn dzin ayera efi wiadze: nyimpa biara runntum nngyina hom enyim

column2: "Hom mfa gya nhyew hɔn enyame ehonyi a wɔasen no: mma hom enyi mmber hɔn ho dwetɛ anaa sika
column3: na so mma hom nnyiyi mmfa
column4: bɛyɛ na woesua hom efir wɔ mu: na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "na mma hom mmfa ekyiwadze nnkɔ hom fie
column3: na hom aannyɛ ebusudze dɛ ɔno: ma ɔnyɛ hom tantan koraa
column4: na hom nkyir hɔn koraa: na ɔyɛ ebusudze."
